VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether University}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Nova Institute}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Publication Count fall between 84.42 and 93.30 papers? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1976, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1962 and 1965?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1963 and 1976 was {lower} than between 1962 and 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1980, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1965 and 1980 was {larger} than between 1979 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1985, did the total Publication Count experience a larger or smaller change than between 1968 and 1972?
NC.A: The change in total publication count between 1968 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1968 and 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1968, was the average total Publication Count higher or lower than between 1971 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total publication count between 1962 and 1968 was {higher} than between 1971 and 1980.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Aether University} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Nova Institute, Aether University}.
